content:
This is with reference to #23852. This PR allows the admin to set whether a non admin user can edit the value of custom profile field.As mentioned by @Sahil Batra in the review I am attaching the screen shots for showing the disabled state when a custom field of type Person Picker is non editable for non-admin users. (In all screen shots mentor is a custom field of type Person Picker which is non editable for non-admin users)
Screenshot-from-2023-01-19-00-50-08.png Screenshot-from-2023-01-19-00-49-24.png Screenshot-from-2023-01-19-00-48-35.png
Which UI looks better ?
I think it would be better to have the one with opacity and background same as for other input fields in disabled state.
